item.title: Comparing R to Python
item.description: Hello! Today, we’ll be looking at the differences in R and Python to do simple statistical tasks. At first, it might seem to be a little scary: But it’s not that hard!

item.title: Part 4 of our series on the agonizing pain I live in every day
item.description: Blog Post #This is Moleman in the morning. Good moleman to you.
